page.title: 09BALLATER CAR-PARKS SURVEY
page.content: There are two main car-parks in Ballater. Station Square This is a rectangular shaped car-park which may hold between 30 and 40 cars. It is just in front of the old railway station and near the shops.During our morning study we learned that most drivers parked for a short time only. The same amount of vistors and locals parked in the square. Most of the tourists visited the information centre and cafe during the morning survey. In the afternoon there were many more vehicles but again the same number of tourists and locals. There were also three Swedish visitors in the car-park. There are no charges for using the carparking facilities in Ballater.
